list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Shop Reply now is a item.
If the price is lower or equal than 0, the purchase was refused by the shop!

task.summary:
Automatic Costumer Added | Messages are now more pretty
Can mix automatic and manual costumers from 1 to 3
The suppliers only works in automatic mode
